gold.user: As a project manager, I want to retrieve the details of a specific task by its ID so that I can review its status and assigned resources.
gold.ideal: The response should include the task's title, description, status, assignee, and any comments associated with it.

gold.user: As a team member, I need to cancel a task that is no longer relevant to our project, so that it does not clutter our task list.
gold.ideal: The response should confirm that the task has been successfully canceled and provide any relevant information about the cancellation.
